content.question: Treaties such as that depicted in the image most directly led to

choices.label: amicable relationships over the long term between British colonists and American Indian nations
defensive maneuvers on the part of the French in the Ohio River valley and the North American interior
the assimilation of American Indian nations and their cultures into the British colonies
the formation of colonial militias in Pennsylvania, Virginia, and Maryland

content.answer: defensive maneuvers on the part of the French in the Ohio River valley and the North American interior

topic.text: 3.2: Seven Years' War (The French and Indian War)
